name: TAIKER
description: TAIKER is a platformer RPG. Peggy and her robot assistant Chopy will explore various area. Obtain skills to beat enemy and solve puzzles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible video card with shader model 3.0 support DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card:
